channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 罂粟是生产海洛因的关键原料，长期以来在缅甸崎岖的边境地区生长茂盛。
item.description:
Poppies, key to producing heroin, have long flourished in Myanmar's rugged borderlands.

After the military seized power in 2021, sparking social and economic turmoil, the cash crop has become even more important to some farmers struggling to get by https://t.co/4KxXeWSx2k pic.twitter.com/pcTPC13pXH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在巴米扬省的一个斜坡边缘，选手们轮番从山坡上飞驰而下，欢呼雀跃，齐心协力让滑雪运动在阿富汗延续下去。
item.description:
From the edge of a slope in the province of Bamiyan, rivals cheer as they take turns to race down the mountainside, united in keeping skiing alive in Afghanistan https://t.co/F0lU6ZiABt pic.twitter.com/Z8qUaBSmRz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 气候谈判通常围绕减少最危险的温室气体--二氧化碳展开。
item.description:
Climate talks often revolve around reducing the most dangerous greenhouse gas, CO2.

But it's the powerful heat-trapping emissions from methane that will be in the crosshairs at a global forum in Geneva this week https://t.co/jSnCIgo4oI pic.twitter.com/4ay036yV2l

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 即将卸任的总统麦基-萨勒（Macky Sall）通过大型公共和私人项目改变了塞内加尔的面貌，监督了工资水平的提高以及连接达喀尔和郊区的新列车。
item.description:
Outgoing President Macky Sall has changed the face of Senegal through major public and private projects, overseeing rising wages and a new train linking Dakar to its suburbs.

Yet many citizens feel left behind after his 12 years in office https://t.co/OFkVaumO70 pic.twitter.com/n4v4TW878g

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 白宫表示，美国总统乔-拜登和以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡周一进行了通话，这是他们一个多月来的首次通话，因为以色列在加沙的进攻导致局势日益紧张。
item.description:
US President Joe Biden and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu spoke Monday, the White House said, their first call in more than a month amid growing tensions over Israel's offensive in Gaza https://t.co/Jgq9GgYvuF pic.twitter.com/3zbC8ckt51

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 一名摄影师在法国受审，他被指控强奸了在交友软件上以拍摄模特照片为诱饵的女性。
item.description:
A photographer is on trial in France, accused of raping women he lured on dating apps with promises of taking their picture for modelling shoots https://t.co/Jd7exKtjhy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 半个世纪前，两位名叫沃尔特-佩雷斯和阿图罗-佩雷斯的瘦弱兄弟开始在他们的尼加拉瓜农村小镇上举起石头，如今他们已成为当地的传奇人物和 TikTok 红人，被称为 "健美之祖"。
item.description:
A half-century ago, two skinny brothers named Walter and Arturo Perez started lifting stones in their rural Nicaraguan town.

Now they are local legends and TikTok sensations known as the "Bodybuilding Grandfathers" https://t.co/n0E72pceTb pic.twitter.com/OxYUHg4RAY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 他们的报酬是在世界上最好的餐厅用餐--但代价是必须在工作上对朋友撒谎。
item.description:
They are paid to eat in the best restaurants in the world — but the price is having to lie even to their friends about the job.

These are the secret agents of the Michelin Guide https://t.co/UgDjfpbiRX pic.twitter.com/LbP5iiAl4T

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在 "伊斯兰国 "的 "哈里发国 "垮台五年之后，数以万计与圣战分子有关联的妇女和儿童仍被美国支持的库尔德武装关押在充斥着虐待的叙利亚难民营中，而且似乎没有计划如何处置他们
item.description:
Five years after the fall of the Islamic State's "caliphate," tens of thousands of women and children linked to the jihadists are still being held by US-backed Kurdish forces in Syrian camps rife with abuse, with seemingly no plan of what to do with them https://t.co/bXhZV1F1ir pic.twitter.com/FIvDDvbnyE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 联合国巴勒斯坦难民机构负责人周一表示，以色列阻止他进入饱受战争蹂躏和围困的加沙地带。
item.description:
The head of the UN agency for Palestinian refugees said Monday Israel had blocked him from entering the war-torn and besieged Gaza Strip, where the UN has warned of impending famine https://t.co/RQOZKwGaHW pic.twitter.com/jdJxgbH4Rs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: #在海地首都郊区的帮派暴力事件中发现 14 具尸体：法新社记者

item.title: 视频：🇲🇲 在缅甸，种植罂粟--从中获取鸦片--已成为许多农民在社会和经济动荡中维持生计的重要途径。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇲🇲 Boom times for Myanmar opium farmers as coup chaos bites

In Myanmar, growing poppies -- from which opium is obtained -- has become an important way for many farmers to make ends meet amid the social and economic turmoil.

📹 AFP
📷 STR#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/HUPgLhwP2A

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: #尼日利亚西北部发生两起袭击事件，100 多人遭绑架：居民和官员
item.description:
#BREAKING Over 100 kidnapped in two attacks in northwest Nigeria: residents, officials pic.twitter.com/taQwaa9LG6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇧🇷 巴西新一轮热浪来袭，里约居民忧心忡忡在该市西部，周六的热指数达到 60.1 ºC，是 Alerta Rio 气象系统开始测量以来的最高值。该指数是在考虑湿度的情况下测量温度的感觉。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇧🇷 Rio residents worried as new heat wave hits Brazil

In west of the city, the heat index reached 60.1 ºC on Saturday, a maximum since the Alerta Rio weather system began taking measurements. The index measures what a temperature feels like, taking into account humidity. pic.twitter.com/Jr6UijzV7f

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇷🇺 俄罗斯选举委员会周一表示，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京以 87.28% 的得票率赢得克里姆林宫的第五个任期，在为期三天的投票中，普京没有遇到真正的挑战者📹 AFPTV/POOL VIA VGTRK/Claire MORAND#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇷🇺 Russian President Vladimir Putin has won a fifth term in the Kremlin with 87.28 percent of votes, the country's electoral commission said on Monday, after a three-day ballot in which he ran against no real challengers

📹 AFPTV/POOL VIA VGTRK/Claire MORAND#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/mFxcwyLFox

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 英国选手劳拉-肯尼（Laura Kenny）是奥运史上最成功的女子自行车运动员，她于周一宣布退役，并表示是时候 "挂起自行车 "了 ➡️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Britain's Laura Kenny, the most successful female cyclist in Olympic history, on Monday announced her retirement, saying it was time to "hang that bike up" ➡️ https://t.co/zeNIwcPrp1 #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/VlF7wBW6PD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 世界排名第二的卡洛斯-阿尔卡拉斯（Carlos Alcaraz）以 7-6 (7/5)、6-1 的比分战胜达尼尔-梅德韦杰夫（Daniil Medvedev），连续第二次夺得 #IndianWells ATP 冠军，两次都是在俄罗斯人的帮助下取得的 ⬇️ #AFPSports
item.description:
World number two Carlos Alcaraz cruised home in a 7-6 (7/5), 6-1 victory over Daniil Medvedev to win a second straight #IndianWells ATP title, both coming at the Russian's expense ⬇️ https://t.co/Yc1K4QzzSX #AFPSports

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 米其林将宣布 62 家新晋星级法国餐厅

Michelin to announce 62 newly starred French restaurantshttps://t.co/8OQc5DNRRm pic.twitter.com/z4cn07kIaL

item.title: 平壤国家媒体称金正日的女儿是 "伟大的指导者"（朝鲜语为 "hyangdo"）--这一称谓通常只用于最高领导人及其继任者。
item.description:
Daughter of North Korea's Kim might be heir apparent, says South Korea.

Pyongyang state media has referred to Kim's teenage daughter as a "great person of guidance" ("hyangdo" in Korean) - a term typically reserved for top leaders and their successorshttps://t.co/oY4z1t9tct pic.twitter.com/IehRvvUMpX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 基因疗法如何改变了镰状细胞患者的生活。两名美国人的生活因这种疗法而发生了转变，他们告诉 @AFP，他们希望其他人也能从中受益。但每个疗程高达 310 万美元的费用可能会限制患者获得治疗的机会。
item.description:
How genetic therapies transformed the lives of sickle cell patients.

Two Americans whose lives were turned around by the treatments tell @AFP they want others to benefit too. But the cost - up to $3.1 million per course of treatment - could limit accesshttps://t.co/OAKBJrVJUV pic.twitter.com/AclDRj7CkK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 棺材俱乐部 "埋葬了人们对死亡的禁忌。这是一项非常重要的任务，但没有什么能阻止新西兰人欢笑，他们聚在一起喝喝茶，说说笑笑，并在独一无二的 DIY 棺材上钉上最后一颗钉子。
item.description:
Coffin clubs' bury taboos about death.

It's a task of grave importance, but there's nothing to stop New Zealanders having a laugh as they meet for cups of tea, a bit of banter, and literally put the final nail in one-of-a-kind DIY coffinshttps://t.co/RjPrO4s7j7 pic.twitter.com/Nx0x3KYzoJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 内战》这部电影想象了近未来美国的第二次内战，凸显了人们对 11 月总统大选前美国分裂状态的担忧。
item.description:
'Civil War'

A film that imagines a second civil war in the near-future United States has highlighted fears about the divided state of the nation ahead of November's presidential electionhttps://t.co/vqHfnCIiGH pic.twitter.com/WLMyjuiKMQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 法新社特别报道：父亲的罪孽：阿里今年 12 岁，他经历了任何孩子都不应该经历的事情，他的半生都在相当于圣战者家庭监狱的营地中度过。
item.description:
AFP Special Report.

Sins of the fathers: Children of Islamic State left to rot in Syria camp.

Ali is 12 and has survived things no child should see, spending half his life in what amounts to a prison camp for jihadist familieshttps://t.co/XMuGIR7Zsl pic.twitter.com/GPyy2oZohi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 视频：巴黎奥运会前，缉毒犬备受追捧。在新的爆炸物探测犬考试中，多次出现不及格的情况，导致人们担心巴黎奥运会上会出现缉毒犬短缺的情况。不过，训练中心承诺今年夏天将有足够的缉毒犬....。
item.description:
VIDEO: Sniffer dogs are sought-after ahead of the Paris Olympics.

Numerous failures in the new exam for explosive detection dogs have led to fears of a shortage for the Paris Olympics. However, the training centre promises that there will be enough sniffer dogs this summer.… pic.twitter.com/zaqG1c4fum

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 视频： 印度港铁食品公司创造了世界上最长的多沙（一种印度流行菜肴）的新纪录。由 75 名厨师组成的团队将面糊倒在特制的平底锅上，然后同步卷起，制作出长达 37.5 米的可丽饼。
item.description:
VIDEO: New world record for longest dosa.

Indian company MTR Foods set a new record for the world's longest dosa, a popular Indian dish. A team of 75 chefs made the 37.5-metre crepe by pouring batter across a specially made pan and rolling it up in synchronised motions pic.twitter.com/gW2LMSRTHc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 怪兽、小行星、吸血鬼：非营利媒体事务》（Nonprofit Media Matters）报道了 TikTok 的趋势，在这一趋势中，用户试图将病毒视频货币化，声称美国政府秘密捕获了包括金刚在内的神话怪物。
item.description:
Monsters, asteroids, vampires: AI conspiracies flood TikTok.

Nonprofit Media Matters reports on TikTok trend where users seek to monetize viral videos making claims about the US government secretly capturing mythical monsters, including King Konghttps://t.co/1lhEIplOl3 pic.twitter.com/7FCeM5Yzmb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚出租车司机赢得优步 1.78 亿美元赔款
item.description:
Australian taxi drivers win $178 million payout from Uberhttps://t.co/X9qbF5lM6k pic.twitter.com/JOod132saN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024
